entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
